title: Constitution Quiz
description: MERN web application enabling users to test their knowledge of American Civics and History
summary-one: Led team of 4 Developers through the application’s end-to-end lifecycle
summary-two: Responsible for designing, building, and styling the application’s UI and Components

title: Budget Tracker
description: Progressive web application empowering users to easily track purchases and deposits both online and offline
summary-one: Used MongoDB Atlas as the application’s cloud database for storing user data
summary-two: Responsible for optimizing the application’s offline functionality and performance

title: Note Taker
description: Web application allowing users to write, save, and delete notes
summary-one: Used Express.js as the application’s server-side framework, and created API Routes to retrieve/save/delete note data from the application’s JSON file
summary-two: Responsible for both the Front End and Back End Development of the application
